mapper.select: SELECT T.state FROM (SELECT state ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP WHERE entry_no = #{entryNo} AND (del_flg IS NULL OR del_flg <> '1') ) T WHERE T.serialRownum = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTRY_HA_TEMP SET gamen_id = #{screenID}, upd_date = #{sysDate} WHERE entry_no = #{entryNo} AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT serial, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP WHERE entry_no = #{entryNo} AND (del_flg IS NULL OR del_flg <> '1') ) T1 WHERE T1.serialRownum = 1 AND ENTRY_HA_TEMP.serial = T1.serial )
